input.sentences: everyone had a great time at the party last week .
there was so much commotion in that small apartment .
we all had a lot to drink .
afterwards we got together for some group photos .
output.sentences: Kyle thought the best part of the week was when it was time to party.
He invited a few friends over, causing commotion at his apartment.
But, in spite of the craziness, he was happy!
Of course, who isn't after a lot to drink?
He blacked the night out, but luckily there were plenty of photos to remind him how much fun he had forgotten.
